data.title: Films available to license for film screenings
data.meta_description: Discover our catalogue of films available to license for non-theatrical film screenings. From latest releases to all-time classics and spanning all genres, the choice is yours.
data.text:
Filmbank Distributors Limited © 2023. All Rights Reserved.

This website is operated by Filmbank Distributors Ltd. a company incorporated under the laws of England and Wales with company number 1021212 and with its registered address at Warner House, 98 Theobald's Road, London, WC1X 8WB, England. Vat Reg No: GB 446 029455.

Click to view the Filmbankmedia Website Policy.

Card payments will take 24hours to be reflected on your customer account. Unless you receive the error message “3ds authentication failed”, the payment has been received. If you receive the “3ds authentication failed” error message, using a different computer and/or browser may resolve the issue. Unfortunately, this is a security feature that is not under our control. Alternative payment methods are bank transfer or cheque. For payment details, please visit https://www.filmbankmedia.com/licences/stsl/card-payment-issues/.
